dc.title: New Brunswick Laboratory
dc.description: The New Brunswick Laboratory (NBL) is a Government-owned, Government-operated center of excellence in the measurement science of nuclear materials., The New Brunswick Laboratory (NBL) is the U.S. Government's Nuclear Materials Measurements and Reference Materials Laboratory., NBL is the U.S. Government's National Certifying Authority for nuclear reference materials and measurement calibration standards., NBL provides reference materials, measurement and interlaboratory measurement evaluation services., NBL provides technical expertise for evaluating measurement methods and safeguards measures in use at other facilities., NBL functions as a Network Laboratory for the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA)., The most respected and trusted provider of the best nuclear material standards and measurement evaluation services in the world., Uranium and Thorium Ores and Impurity Reference Materials, Plutonium Certified Reference Materials, Uranium Certified Reference Materials, FY 2008 Certified Reference Materials Price List, CRM Listing, Prices and Certificates
